title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy

sources.title: Abbott And Costello Meet The Mummy
sources.description: Two bumbling Americans stumble on the discovery of a lifetime when their search for a mummy leads them to a sacred medallion that holds the key to buried treasure.

metadata.Plot: In Egypt Peter and Freddie find the archaeologist Dr. Zoomer murdered before they can return to America. A medallion leads them to a crypt where a revived mummy provides the terror.
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Marie Windsor
